title: 13 Vamperotica comics (1994-2000) (Brainstorm) Luxura
description:
Mature readers only, due to sex and violence... and just 'cause 90s Bad Girls comics, LOL.

Vamperotica #1-6, #11, and #17-22, and 8 other specials. You'll find very early (and explicit) work from Georges Jeanty in #20-22. (Jeanty later drew Bishop, Deadpool, Gambit and Weapon X for Marvel and then become the popular long-term artist on Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Season 8.)

All credit goes to the scanners, including YZ1 and johnny2eyes-DCP.
